General.Name: Sarda Energy & Minerals Limited
General.Description: Sarda Energy & Minerals Limited produces and sells steel products in India. Its product portfolio includes sponge iron, billets and wire rods, ferro alloys, eco-bricks, and HB wires. The company is also involved in the coal and iron ore mining, as well as operation of thermal, hydro, and solar power plants; and offers iron pellets. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Raipur Alloys & Steel Limited. Sarda Energy & Minerals Limited was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Raipur, India.
